ItemType.name: Síva-8M reactor
ItemType.description: This reactor has a peak power output of 8MW in efficiency mode and 12MW in overdrive. It accepts fuel rated between L1 and L3, and can easily switch modes with the built-in Cabbage Corp Toolset.

ItemType.description: This reactor has a peak power output of 12MW in efficiency mode and 18MW in overdrive. It accepts fuel rated between L1 and L3, and can easily switch modes with the built-in Cabbage Corp Toolset.
